metadata.name: 6Sigma Access Pass
metadata.description:
The 6Sigma Access Pass grants lifetime full access to the 6Sigma Discord community.

The 6Sigma Alpha and Education Discord is an active community for newcomers and veterans of the industry alike to collaborate and share their collective wisdom whilst also providing access to educational resources, proprietary analytics, fundamental research, market insights and real time data feeds.

### Your membership will include:

Access to 6Sigma proprietary analytical bots, real time NFT market alerts and custom tooling, weekly AMA's with NFTzyBoi and his team as well as project founders across the NFT space, access to a community of like minded NFT collectors, WL spot giveaways to upcoming projects, monthly giveaways, educational resources and much more!

### Pricing tiers are as follows:

1. Passes 1-300: 0.20 Ξ
2. Passes 301-400: 0.40 Ξ
3. Passes 401-888: Market Rate at time of issuance

The 6Sigma team are looking forward to welcoming you into our community - we cant wait to meet you!

**Disclaimer:** You alone assume the sole responsibility of evaluating the merits and risks associated with the use of any information or other content provided within the 6Sigma Discord server. Nothing within the server constitutes financial or legal advice, please always DYOR and never risk more than you're willing to lose.
